Elaborate lockboxes are boxes found within the Camdozaal Vault, typically found around the middle of the vault. Players must exit the vault before the one minute timer runs out to keep their lockboxes; otherwise, they will lose all lockboxes they have acquired whilst inside. Lockboxes the player was carrying before entering the vault will not be lost.

Elaborate lockboxes have a 4/50 (1/12.5) chance to roll the gear drop table, which contains weapons and armour ranging from steel to adamant.

Contents

  • 1 Loot
    • 1.1 Standard
    • 1.2 Gear drop table
  • 2 Changes

Loot[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Elaborate lockbox loot is worth 1,004.79.

Standard[edit | edit source]

Elaborate lockboxes have two rolls on the loot table. The displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Gear drop table[edit | edit source]

There is a 4/50 chance of rolling the gear drop table. If one of the player's two rolls on the elaborate lockbox loot table rolled the gear drop table, they cannot roll for it again.

Below lists the effective drop rates.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 April 2021
(update)

Loot from opening lockboxes have been re-balanced to reflect the time spent to access the Camdozaal Vault.
